Sentencas: The search for clean and renewable sources of energy represents one of the most vital challenges facing us today.
Titulo: Rational design of novel cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells using first-principles simulations

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are among the most promising technologies for a clean and secure energy future due to their high energy efficiency and excellent fuel flexibility (e.g., direct utilization of hydrocarbons or renewable fuels).
Titulo: Rational design of novel cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells using first-principles simulations

Sentencas: To make SOFCs economically competitive, however, development of new materials for low-temperature operation is essential.
Titulo: Rational design of novel cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells using first-principles simulations

Sentencas: Here we report our results on a computational study to achieve rational design of SOFC cathodes with fast oxygen reduction kinetics and rapid ionic transport.
Titulo: Rational design of novel cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells using first-principles simulations

Sentencas: Results suggest that surface catalytic properties are strongly correlated with the bulk transport properties in several material systems with the formula of La0.5Sr0.5BO2.75 (where B = Cr, Mn, Fe, or Co).
Titulo: Rational design of novel cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells using first-principles simulations

Sentencas: The predictions seem to agree qualitatively with available experimental results on these materials.
Titulo: Rational design of novel cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells using first-principles simulations

Sentencas: This computational screening technique may guide us to search for high-efficiency cathode materials for a new generation of SOFCs.
Titulo: Rational design of novel cathode materials in solid oxide fuel cells using first-principles simulations
